code: import{useState}from"react";import{useTaskContext}from"../contexts/TaskContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function UserList(){const{users,selectedUser,addUser,selectUser,removeUser}=useTaskContext();const[input,setInput]=useState("");const handleAdd=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(input.trim()){addUser(input.trim());setInput("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{id:"userList",children:users.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:"No hay usuarios."}):users.map((u,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{style:{cursor:"pointer",fontWeight:selectedUser===i?"bold":"normal"},onClick:()=>selectUser(i),children:[u.name,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:e=>{e.stopPropagation();removeUser(i);},children:"\uD83D\uDDD1\uFE0F"})]},i))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleAdd,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{id:"newUserInput",value:input,onChange:e=>setInput(e.target.value),placeholder:"Nuevo usuario..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"A\xF1adir Usuario"})]})]});}
